Verses: 1 pillaigale, Ungal Petraarukkuk Karththarukkul Keezhppadiyungal, Idhu Niyaayam.
2 unakku Nanmai Undaayiruppadharkum, Boomiyile Vaazhnaal Neediththiruppadharkum,
3 un Thagappanaiyum Un Thaayaiyum Ganampannuvaayaaga Enbadhe Vaakkuththaththamulla Mudhalaang Karpanaiyaayirukkiradhu.
4 pidhaakkale, Neengalum Ungal Pillaigalaik Kobappaduththaamal, Karththarukketra Sitchaiyilum Podhanaiyilum Avargalai Valarppeergalaaga.
5 velaikkaarare, Neengal Kiristhuvukkuk Keezhppadigiradhupola, Sareeraththinpadi Ungal Ejamaangalaayirukkiravargalukkum Bayaththodum Nadukkaththodum Kabadatra Manadhodum Keezhppadindhu;
6 manusharukkup Piriyamaayirukka Virumbugiravargalaagap Paarvaikku Oozhiyanseyyaamal, Kiristhuvin Oozhiyakkaararaaga, Manappoorvamaai Dhevanudaiya Siththaththinpadi Seyyungal.
7 adimaiyaanavanaanaalum, Suyaadheenamullavanaanaalum, Avanavan Seygira Nanmaiyinpadiye Karththaridaththil Balanai Adaivaanendru Arindhu,
8 manusharukkendru Oozhiyanjseyyaamal, Karththarukkendre Nalmanadhode Oozhiyanseyyungal.

9 ejamaangale, Appadiye Neengalum, Velaikkaararukkuch Seyyavendiyavaigalaich Seydhu, Avargalukkum Ungalukkum Ejamaanaanavar Paralogaththil Irukkiraarendrum, Avaridaththil Patchapaadhamillaiyendrum Arindhu, Kadunsollai Vittuvidungal.
10 kadaisiyaaga, En Sagodharare, Karththarilum Avarudaiya Saththuvaththin Vallamaiyilum Balappadungal.
11 neengal Pisaasin Thandhirangalodu Edhirththunirkath Thiraaniyullavargalaagumpadi, Dhevanudaiya Sarvaayudhavarkkaththaiyum Thariththukkollungal.

12 enenil, Maamsaththodum Raththaththodumalla, Dhuraiththanangalodum, Adhigaarangalodum, Ippirabanjaththin Andhagaara Logaadhibadhigalodum, Vaanamandalangalilulla Pollaadha Aavigalin Senaigalodum Namakkup Poraattam Undu.

13 aagaiyaal, Theengunaalile Avaigalai Neengal Edhirkkavum, Sagalaththaiyum Seydhumudiththavargalaai Nirkavum Thiraaniyullavargalaagumpadikku, Dhevanudaiya Sarvaayudhavarkkaththaiyum Eduththukkollungal.
14 saththiyam Ennum Kachchaiyai Ungal Araiyil Kattinavargalaayum Needhiyennum Maarkkavasaththaith Thariththavargalaayum;
15 samaadhaanaththin Suviseshaththirkuriya Aayaththam Ennum Paadharatchaiyaik Kaalgalile Thoduththavargalaayum,
16 pollaangan Eyyum Akkiniyaasthirangalaiyellaam Aviththuppodaththakkadhaai, Ellaavatrirkum Melaaga Visuvaasamennum Kedagaththaip Pidiththukkondavargalaayum Nillungal.
17 ratchaniyamennum Thalaichseeraavaiyum, Dhevavasanamaagiya Aaviyin Pattayaththaiyum Eduththukkollungal.

18 endhach Samayaththilum Sagalavidhamaana Vendudhalodum Vinnappaththodum Aaviyinaale Jebampanni, Adhanporuttu Migundha Manaurudhiyodum Sagala Parisuththavaangalukkaagavum Pannum Vendudhalodum Vizhiththukkondirungal.
19 suviseshaththirkaagach Sangiliyaal Kattappattirukkira Sthaanaabadhiyaagiya Naan Adhaippatrip Pesavendiyapadi Dhairiyamaaip Pesaththakkadhaaga,
20 naan Dhairiyamaai En Vaayaiththirandhu Suviseshaththin Ragasiyaththai Arivikkiradharku Vaakku Enakku Kodukkappadumpadi Enakkaagavum Vinnappampannungal.

21 andriyum, Enakkaduththa Kaariyangalum, En Sugaseydhigalum Ungalukkuth Theriyavarumbadikku, Avaigalaiyellaam Namakkup Piriyamaana Sagodharanum Karththarukkul Unmaiyulla Oozhiyakkaaranumaayirukkira Theegikku Ungalukku Arivippaan.
22 neengal Engal Seydhigalai Ariyavum, Avan Ungal Irudhayangalukku Aarudhal Seyyavum, Avanai Ungalidaththil Anuppinen.
23 pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum, Sagodhararukku Samaadhaanamum Visuvaasaththodukoodiya Anbum Undaavadhaaga.
24 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukirisdhuvinidaththil Azhiyaadha Anbudane Anbukoorugira Yaavarodum Kirubai Undaayiruppadhaaga. Aamen.
